TextLibrary.Text: Where is the Cloak? You took it!
Where is the Cloak? You took it!
Where is the Cloak? You took it!
Where is the Cloak? You took it!
Jarl said the Helm was worth more than the Hammer, and the Cloak would... Oh look, never mind...
Jarl said the Helm was worth more than the Hammer, and the Cloak would... Oh look, never mind...
Jarl said the Helm was worth more than the Hammer, and the Cloak would... Oh look, never mind...
Jarl said the Helm was worth more than the Hammer, and the Cloak would... Oh look, never mind...
Never mind? You take two of my things and only return one? I demand you go to Jarl and get my favorite Boots from him...
